entries.title_d: The Dantooine station has had most of its supply fleet conscripted by the Empire and the station owner has asked you to assist him in getting those ships back. He has offered you landing rights for assisting him.
entries.title: Dantooine System: Rescue the Freighter
entries.thanks_5: I knew Droz wouldn't leave me to rot.
entries.thanks_4: The Empire has been taught a lesson.
entries.thanks_2: Droz picked the right pilot for this job.
entries.taunt_5: Do you really think you will win?
entries.taunt_4: That freighter is as good as dead.
entries.taunt_3: Rebel scum like you should know their place.
entries.taunt_2: Fine, we will just destroy the freighter.
entries.taunt_1: Foolish Rebel! You cannot thwart the will of the Empire.
entries.target_disabled: Freighters systems shut down. Move in close and assist it in escape.
entries.split_quest_alert_fail: Destroy the Imperial Logistic's Officer. He is the reason that the Dantooine supply fleet was conscripted and is ultimately responsible for the loss of the frieghter. Stand by for coordinates to his location.
entries.split_quest_alert: The Imperials are destroying the some of the Dantooine stations supply fleet as punishment for the loss of that freighter. Help the fleet drive off the attackers.
entries.recovery_success: My freighter is jumping to safety now...thanks.
entries.quest_recover_d: Move in close to the freighter and wait for them to get their systems back online.
entries.quest_location_d: The supply fleet is being used by the Imperials in the Dantooine system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the freighter to safety, protecting it from Imperial counterattacks.
entries.quest_disable_d: Shut down the freighters systems so the pilot can reprogram the autopilot.
entries.panic_5: I should have known...they are coming back to finish me off.
entries.panic_4: Wow, we sure made them mad.
entries.panic_3: Imperial TIEs incoming. Keep them off of me.
entries.panic_1: I knew they would not let me get away so easily.
entries.failed_escape: You let them take my freighter out of the system. I doubt I will ever see that one again.
entries.failed_destroy: I was really hoping that it wouldn't come to this. Blast those Imperials!
entries.complete: Ok, I have my freighter back. You did good pilot...real good.
entries.capture_started: Assisting freighter on restarting its systems. Stand by.
entries.capture_phase_2: Ok, our systems are back online. Powering up now.
entries.capture_phase_1: Hey, I knew old Droz wouldn't leave us to rot under the yoke of these Imperials.
entries.capture_complete: Freighter is back under its own power. Escort it to safety.
entries.arrival_phase_2: I have a lock on my ship. Intercept and recapture it for me.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Ok, I am tracking one of my ships. When I send you its location, you go and rescue it...okay?
entries.abort: Hey, I thought you were going to help us?
